articles.author: Robert Frank
articles.content:
Jeff Bezos, founder and CEO of Amazon, speaks to a group of Amazon employees that are veterans during an Amazon Veterans Day celebration on Monday, November 12, 2018.
Jeff Bezos would owe $5.7 billi… [+4127 chars]
articles.description: Sen. Elizabeth Warren said the tax is even more urgent during the Covid crisis, as the pandemic has exposed and accelerated America's wealth gap.
articles.title: Jeff Bezos would pay over $5 billion a year under Warren's wealth tax - CNBC
